Uses of Interface
org.gridgain.grid.GridFuture

Packages that use GridFuture
org.gridgain.grid  Start Here  Contains main In-Memory Compute Grid APIs. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache  Start Here  Contains main In-Memory Data Grid APIs. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.datastructures Contains distributed data structures that work on top of data grid. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.query Contains query related public classes and interfaces. 
org.gridgain.grid.lang Contains general language constructs and functional APIs. 
org.gridgain.grid.typedef Contains typedefs definitions for frequently used classes.

Subinterfaces of GridFuture in org.gridgain.grid.cache.query
 interface GridCacheQueryFuture<T>
          Cache query future returned by GridCacheQuery.execute(GridProjection...) or by analogous methods on GridCacheReduceQuery and GridCacheTransformQuery.
